document.full_text: it should come as no surprise that phil mickelson showcased both the best and worst of his game as he launched the defense of his masters title at augusta national on thursday.
document.title: mickelson stays in hunt after up and down round
lines_and_colors: it should come as no surprise that phil mickelson showcased both the best and worst of his game as he launched the defense of his masters title at augusta national on thursday.
